Key Match Events: Klaus Gjasula scored a dramatic late equaliser after an own-goal to snatch a draw against Croatia
Andrej Kramaric scored a goal for Croatia
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Albania's first point of Euro 2024
Others: The result sees Albania remain in third spot behind Italy and leaders Spain, who both have three points ahead of the top two in Group B facing off on Wednesday evening. Croatia sit bottom with a vastly inferior goal difference.
